title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 109
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 109

State Regulations

Certificate Of Approval

To Operate

Drug Abuse Treatment

And/Or Preventive Education Programs
(Voluntary Agency)
having made application for approval to the NEW YORK STATE DRUG
ABUSE CONTROL COMMISSION pursuant to the provisions of Mental Hygiene Law, ยง81.38 to operate a drug abuse treatment and/or preventive education program, and having been found to be in compliance with such law and applicable Rules
and Regulations of the Commission, this Certificate of Approval is hereby
granted for the operation of a program in conformity with that described in the
application for the period ________ to ________. Dated: ________
____________
Secretary for: New York State

Drug Abuse Control

Commission

Albany, New York 12203

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app
109

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
